com.tinkerpop.frames.modules.typedgraph

Class TypeRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tinkerpop.frames.modules.typedgraph.TypeRegistry

  • public class TypeRegistry
extends Object
    A TypeRegistry for a FramedGraph. With a TypeRegistry the FramedGraph is able to store type-information on edges, and use stored type-information to construct vertices/edges based on type-information stored in the graph (runtime).
    See Also:
    TypeField, TypeValue, FramedGraph

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TypeRegistry()

    • Constructor Detail

      • TypeRegistry

        public TypeRegistry()

    • Method Detail

      • getTypeHoldingTypeField

        public Class<?> getTypeHoldingTypeField(Class<?> type)
        Returns:
        The interface that has the TypeField annotation for this class. (Either the class itself, or a base class if the class was registered).

      • getType

        public Class<?> getType(Class<?> typeHoldingTypeField,
               String typeValue)
        Parameters:
        typeHoldingTypeField - The type that has the TypeField annotation for the Proxy class to be constructed.
        typeValue - The actual persisted value for a type field on an Element in the graph
        Returns:
        The type that needs to be constructed, or null if there is no registered class that matches the input values.

      • add

        public TypeRegistry add(Class<?> type)
        Parameters:
        Add - the interface to the registry. The interface should have a TypeValue annotation, and there should be a TypeField annotation on the interface or its parents.
